Race.SpecificTitle: Council Member -- City of Denham Springs
Gravity Drainage Dist. No. 6 Prop. No. 1 -- 5.0 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District No. 6 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall the Gravity Drainage District No. 6 of the Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974, as amended, and other authority, be authorized to levy and collect, and to adopt an ordinance providing for same, a special ad valorem tax of five (5.0) mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation within the boundaries of the District (the "Tax") (an estimated  $250,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the tax collection for the year 2018, and annually thereafter, to and including the tax collection for the year 2027, and shall the proceeds of said Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collection and administration) be dedicated and used solely for the following purposes: constructing, operating and maintaining gravity drainage works in the District, title to which shall be in the public, or any other lawful purpose, including but not limited to securing and paying bonded indebtedness of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drainage Dist. No. 6 Prop. No. 2 -- .5% S&U Tax - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District No. 6 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall the Gravity Drainage District No. 6 of the Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 & 32 of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974, as amended, and other authority, be authorized, and to adopt an ordinance, to levy and collect, of a sales and use tax of one-half of one percent (.5%) on sales at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales and services within the District, as defined by law, inclusive (the "Tax") (an estimated $450,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, commencing effective January 1, 2018 at the earliest, and shall the proceeds of said Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collection and administration) be dedicated and used solely for the following purposes: constructing, operating and maintaining gravity drainage works in the District, to be titled in the public, or any other lawful purpose, including but not limited to securing and paying bonded indebtedness of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drainage Dist. No. 7 -- 8 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Gravity Drainage District No. 7 of the Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974, as amended, and other authority, be authorized to levy and collect, and to adopt an ordinance providing for same, a special ad valorem tax of eight (8.0) mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation within the boundaries of the District (the "Tax") (an estimated $900,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the tax collection for the year 2018, and annually thereafter, to and including the tax collection for the year 2027, and shall the proceeds of said Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collection and administration) be dedicated and used solely for the following purposes constructing, operating and maintaining gravity drainage works in the District, title to which shall be in the public, or any other lawful purpose, including but not limited to securing and paying bonded indebtedness of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 8 -- 16.63 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 8 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 8 of Livingston Parish, Louisiana (the "District") renew the levy and collection of a special tax of sixteen and sixty three hundredths mills (16.63) (an estimated $164,000.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities, for purchasing fire truck and other fire-fighting equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for the hydrant rentals and services?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 9 -- 10.38 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 9 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 9 of the Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana (the "District") renew the levy and collection of a special tax of ten and thirty-eight hundredths mills (10.38) (an estimated $192,922.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities and for purchasing fire fighting equipment necessary and incidental thereto?
